description: Try our easy to follow Quick Pumpkin Soup Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pumpkin risotto,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Rice,Winter,Dinner Made Easy,Sesame free
name: Quick Pumpkin Soup Risotto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Perfect Italiano Shredded Parmesan, plus extra, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare rice as per packet instructions.
Add rice and pumpkin soup to a large saucepan over medium heat. Fill one empty tub of soup with water and add to the pan. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until reduced. Stir in parmesan.
Divide risotto among bowls, top with extra parmesan and serve with toasted sourdough.
